Reviews.Title: Just as described.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have Zmodo at my home and business.  Camera resolution is sufficient for identification.  Installation is simple if you have a Frank.  And spying upon your employees is entertaining.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Big Dog
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up and great product.  Will buy from Zmodo again if I need another system. Great Great Great !

ProductInfo.Features:
Instand email alert with photo if activity detected
When everyone else is asleep, our cameras are watching closely
24IR LEDs allow for 65ft automatic night vision
The metal housing is designed for indoors & outdoors use
1TB hard drive allows for 24/7 recording over 8 days
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo 16CH H.264 DVR Security CCTV Surveillance Camera System With 16 Outdoor Night Vision IR Surveillance Camera 1TB Hard Drive
